content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was commanded to google "advanced propulsion systems for interstellar travel" and my computer returned a list of links, including articles on interstellar travel, a traveler's guide to the stars, and advanced propulsion systems for interstellar travel. The links also included information on the physics of interstellar travel, antimatter propulsion, and a book on advanced propulsion systems.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "advanced materials for interstellar travel"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.nasa.gov/sites/default/files/files/Benefits-Stemming-from-Space-Exploration-2013-TAGGED.pdf", "https://thebulletin.org/2021/07/is-using-nuclear-materials-for-space-travel-dangerous-genius-or-a-little-of-both/", "https://aerospace.illinois.edu/news/new-research-seeks-optimize-space-travel-efficiency", "https://www.nasa.gov/feature/glenn/2022/nasa-s-new-material-built-to-withstand-extreme-conditions", "https://cosmosmagazine.com/space/exploration/new-space-materials-for-mars/", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Interstellar_travel", "https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/abs/10.1002/adma.201802201", "https://www.inverse.com/science/grx-810-nasa"]', type='action_result')]
"""
